id.description: The unique identifier for the check

server.description: The name of the employee who created the check

check_num.description: The numeric identifier for the check

table.description: The number of the table, if available

check_opened.description: The time of day that the check was opened, in twelve-hour format

station.description: The prep station that received the ticket

expediter_level.description: The Two-Level Fulfillment setting for the expediter: 1 for single level or 2 for two levels

fired_date.description: The time of day that the ticket was fired, in twelve-hour format

fulfilled_date.description: The time of day that the ticket was fulfilled, in twelve-hour format

fulfillment_time.description: The amount of time it took for the ticket to be fulfilled

fulfilled_by.description: The name of the employee who fulfilled the ticket

date.description: Date folder name from SFTP path
